page.title: 20Who did the survey.
page.content:
Three Primary schools have worked together on this area. Each research- ing 4 sq. km. and contributing to the pages of text.{Merton Primary}School, Syston (MP) and{Eastfield Primary} School, Thurmaston (EP) each used its older pupils but held surveys of the whole school.{Church Hill Junior {School,}Thurmaston (CH) involved most of its 77 Third Year pupils.
The area was { ! } All text divided up as shown: {!} pages were {! }drafted by +____+____+____+____+ {!} children !{MP}!{MP}!{MP}!{MP}! {! }and then +___________________+ {!} edited by !{CH}!{CH}!{EP}!{EP}! {! }a teacher +___________________+ {!} from Church !{CH}!{CH}!{EP}!{EP}! {! }Hill Junior +____+____+____+____+ {!} School.
